partners.title: Partners
partners.subtitle: Join our partner ecosystem and help connect the world through breaking language barriers.

enterprise.title: Enterprise Teams
enterprise.description: Deploy Meeshy in your company to enable seamless multilingual communication across global teams.

education.title: Educational Institutions
education.description: Enable international collaboration in schools and universities with multilingual communication tools.

tech.title: Technology Partners
tech.description: Integrate Meeshy's translation technology into your products and services.

onPremise.title: On-Premise Deployment
onPremise.description: Complete control of your data with enterprise-grade on-premise deployment.

cloud.title: Cloud Deployment
cloud.description: Fast and scalable deployment with our managed cloud solution.

priority.title: Priority Support
priority.description: 24/7 dedicated support for all partners with guaranteed response times.

support.title: Technical Support
support.description: Access to our technical team for integration and deployment assistance.

visibility.title: Co-Marketing
visibility.description: Joint marketing opportunities and visibility on our partner page.

become.title: Become a Partner
become.description: Ready to transform communication in your organization? Contact us to discuss a customized partnership.
